channel.title: Comments on: Coldplay’s Chris Martin defends Nickelback

item.title: By: John Vronst
item.dc:creator: John Vronst
item.description: wow nickelback is good. and sublime is bad. nickelback's stuff they dont release as singles is crazy heavy. its just everyone hates and knows nb for their soft music. yea. srry nb.
item.content:encoded: wow nickelback is good. and sublime is bad. nickelback’s stuff they dont release as singles is crazy heavy. its just everyone hates and knows nb for their soft music. yea. srry nb.

item.title: By: Logan K. Young
item.dc:creator: Logan K. Young
item.description: There is only one band worse than Nickelback...Sublime.
item.content:encoded: There is only one band worse than Nickelback…Sublime.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: Live is my number 1 most hated band of all time.
item.content:encoded: Live is my number 1 most hated band of all time.

item.title: By: BCSheep
item.dc:creator: BCSheep
item.description: Live does rock. So does The Wedding Present.
item.content:encoded: Live does rock. So does The Wedding Present.
